short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lets you load pages in IE with a single right-click context menu

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open IE opens the current page in your other browsers.
Works on Windows and linux 64bit (Required Modules)
